summary: An indebted young woman gets a proposal from a handsome man. Apply for work on a luxury yacht with his boss, the difficult, old and infirm chairman of a large company, where they can then manipulate him to get their hands on his wealth.
cast: Soo-jung Lim|Yeon-Seok Yoo|Dean Dawson|Jeff Johnson|Jin Kyung|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Do-hee Min|Cheol-min Park|Sodany Soy
title: Eun-mil-han yu-hok
